# Natural Earth Parks and Protected Lands (South Africa subset)

Status: deprecated for NBMS default protected-area ingest (no South Africa coverage in current layer extent). Replaced by DFFE SAPAD public release feed documented in `dffe_sapad_protected_areas.md`.

- Source URL: `https://naturalearth.s3.amazonaws.com/10m_cultural/ne_10m_parks_and_protected_lands.zip`
- Dataset title: `ne_10m_parks_and_protected_lands`
- License: Public Domain
- Terms: `https://www.naturalearthdata.com/about/terms-of-use/`
- Attribution: Natural Earth
- Date accessed: 2026-02-08
- SHA-256: `278c21bd62f58ef27df1aa161a5af076308b5bb8306699eced40d56ebe073f71`
- NBMS usage:
  - spatial source code: `NE_PROTECTED_LANDS_ZA`
  - map layer code: `ZA_PROTECTED_AREAS_NE`
  - clipped to South Africa bbox during ingest
